ygData.subject: Mend, my most useless and irritating skill.
ygData.msgSnippet: Of the monks that I know, it seems that I have the worst luck at getting my Mend skill to work, especially in high risk combat situations.  I have maxed out
ygData.messageBody:
Of the monks that I know, it seems that I have the worst luck at getting my
Mend skill to work, especially in high risk combat situations. I have
maxed out the skill at 17th level. This is not an exaggeration. Yesterday
I was soloing scarecrows in West Karana. I was earning a little Xp and
practicing my newly aquired FD skill, which did work, I used mend 4 times
in about a 2 hour period of time. It worked once, failed twice, and
worsened my wounds the last time, which killed me when I had a white
scarecrow on its last legs. My character basically committed suicide at
the point where he was going to win. As I said, it seems I have the worse
luck with Mend. Does any one else have this problem or am I just the
victim of bad numbers?

Shando, 17th circle, Silent Fist Clan
Bertoxxulous
